reviewText: This DVD rocks! The best thing about it, besides the good camerawork with the Pasonic DVX 100's and the sound, is the EDITING. No quick cuts, no spinning, no headaches or nausea. Great creative job by whoever was behind this. And killer show. I was there..

Title: N/A

reviewText: This DVD is an absolute must have for any fan of Thrash Metal. Anthrax put on one hell of a performance, playing music from their classic 85-91 period with Joey Belladonna back behind the mic and Dan Spitz on lead guitar for the first time in many years.The performance is amazing, the music sounds fresh and very heavy; the crowd are enthusiastic and the audio and video quality are top notch.This is one of the most enjoyable thrash DVDs on the market; the band are so energetic and really get into the spirit of things and give it everything they've got.On top of the amazing dvd, this set also comes with a cd of the majority of the concert so you can listen to it in the car.Songs like `Time,' `Medusa,' and `Lone Justice,' are great to hear live, and on top of that all the fan favorites you'd expect from `Madhouse,' to `Caught in a Mosh,' are present and accounted for, with extra little breakdowns and flourishes added to spice things up. The band even throw in a furious performance of `Death Rider,' which Joey makes his own.If you like Anthrax you really ought to get this, and if you're new to the band this is a fantastic place to start; a great set list, a tonne of energy and great production... what more could you want ?
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is a SICK SHOW. Anthrax gets back to their roots here, and lays down one incredible live show here. All of the old classics are performed, and they don't miss a beat. The original line-up, and one kick as set....What are you waiting for?? This is a classic peice of Metal History, BUY IT ALREADY!!!!

reviewText: A DREAM COME TRUE FOR JOEY FANS.  AS A JOHN BUSH/ANTHRAX FAN, THIS IS A HUGE STEP BACKWARDS IN THE NAME OF ECONOMICS.  THE ENERGY/AGGRESSIVE APPROACH ON THE MASS DESTRUCTION DVD MAKES THIS LOOK LIKE AND OLDIES SHOW.
summary: FOR A BUSH-ERA FAN, VERY DISSAPOINTING.

reviewText: This show kicks ass I was there. I read how good the dvd was on [...] and I had to own it - but I can't find myself in it, either way Anthrax is electrifying and will blow you away! Buy it!!!!!

reviewText: I was at this concert and crowd surfed at LEAST 7-10 times, each time going over the barrier.  On no less than 5 of these occasions I looked right at the cameras, streching my hands nearly to the roof of the place, hoping to make my acting debut on the DVD.I am nowhere to be found!!!!!!That aside, great document of a landmark show.  Interesting how 14 years ago they claimed Joey was "Not a good fit" for them. Why all of a sudden is a he a good fit now?  I wonder how John Bush feels.Above hypocrisy and my antics on the cutting room floor make this a 3 instead of a 4 or 5.... mosh on!
summary: KILLER DVD BUT I AM NOT IN IT MOSHING AS I HAD HOPED!
Title: N/A
